title: Fails to sync file with changes to data + xattrs

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

labels.name: skip-changelog
labels.description: Bugs that have never been in a released stable version, and as such excluded from the release notes

body:
- v1.22.2-rc.1
 - macOS 13.0.1

I compiled a custom build for macOS to work around #8657, which is definitely making progress. But I think there may be a side effect or regression now, because although I can get my 2 machines to agree when they are 100% synced, I am now facing a new issue: changes on Mac-A are not fully propagating to Mac-B.

Syncthing is copying the file over to the right place, and naming it `.syncthing.foo.tmp` but the rename never happens, so I'm now getting **Out of Sync** errors. I enabled some additional Debug Facilities on Mac-B (`app`, `fs`, `main`, `walkfs` and `watchaggregator`) and here's what I'm seeing:

